text_logic_form: Line $m$ is the perpendicular bisector of line $XZ$.
The length of line $WZ$ is also $a + 12$.
dissolved_text_logic_form: Line $m$ is the perpendicular bisector of line $XZ$.
The length of line $WZ$ is also $a + 12$.
diagram_logic_form: Point $Y$ lies on the line connecting $X$ and $Z$.
Point $W$ lies on the line connecting $D$ and $Y$.
Point $W$ also lies on the line connecting $D$ and $T$.
Point $Y$ lies on the line connecting $D$ and $T$.
Point $Y$ also lies on the line connecting $W$ and $T$.
The length of line $XY$ is equal to the length of line $YZ$.
